guide.introduction: make a web browser in power point 2003 to surf the net when in a slide show but not watch videos or online gaming or download stuff
guide.introduction_rendered: make a web browser in power point 2003 to surf the net when in a slide show but not watch videos or online gaming or download stuff

lines.text: open up powerpoint onto a blank slide
lines.text_raw: open up powerpoint onto a blank slide

lines.text: right click on any task pane and make sure standard,formatting,control toolbox,drawing and visual basic are ticked (checked)
lines.text_raw: right click on any task pane and make sure standard,formatting,control toolbox,drawing and visual basic are ticked (checked)

lines.text: two task panes will come up just drag them to fit in at the bottom
lines.text_raw: two task panes will come up just drag them to fit in at the bottom

guide.summary: this guide will show you how to make a web browser in power point 2003
guide.title: MAKE YOUR OWN WEB BROWSER
